post.author: 권상하
post.content:
캐나다 시민권자일 경우에
미국에서 콘트랙터로 일을 할수가 있습니까?
정규직만 가능한건 아닌지?

>our company is looking for one web developer. If you are interested in, please forward to joohong.kim@samsung.com ASAP.
>
>It will be appreciated.
>
>Start Date : next week
>
>Duration : 10 weeks
>
>Place : Dallas TX or Irvine CA
>
>Minimum years : 3~4 years
>
>Skills : Java/J2EE, HTML/Java Script, Database(Oracle/MS SQL), etc.
>
>
post.title: [re] Web developer contract position in US
